item.title: Daniel Boone - Beautiful Sunday
item.description:
작사: Boone, McQueen
KY: 3061 / KY: 7150

Sunday morning
up with the lark
I think I’ll take
a walk in the park
Hey hey hey
It’s a beautiful day
I’ve got someone
waiting for me
And when I see her
I know that she’ll say
Hey hey hey
It’s a beautiful day
Hi hi hi
beautiful Sunday
This is my my my
beautiful day
When you
said said said
Said that you
love me
Oh my my my
it’s a beautiful day
Birds are singing
you by my side
Let’s take the car
and go for a ride
Hey hey hey
it’s a beautiful day
We’ll drive on and
follow the sun
Making Sunday
go on and on
Hey hey hey
it’s a beautiful day
Hi hi hi
beautiful Sunday
This is my my my
beautiful day
When you
said said said
Said that you
love me
Oh my my my
it’s a beautiful day
Hi hi hi
beautiful Sunday
This is my my my
beautiful day
When you
said said said
Said that you
love me
Oh my my my
it’s a beautiful day

beautiful Sunday
This is my my my
beautiful day
When you
said said said
Said that you
love me
Oh my my my
it’s a beautiful day
